1.0.0.name: wordpress/advanced-twitter-profile-widget
1.0.0.description:
Adds a sidebar widget to display Twitter updates (using the Javascript). You can set number of messages, color and other features.

You can change colors of shell background and shell text; tweet background, tweet text and tweet link. You can set on/off a features like scrollbar, show hashtags, poll for new results, show timestamps/avatars and the behavior.
